class.name: CATAcquisitionAgent
class.abstract: Base class for a state command acquisition agent.

method.name: GetContextualMenu
method.abstract: Returns the contextual menu.

method.name: GetValuationState
method.abstract: Returns the valuation state of the agent.

method.name: SetFilter
method.abstract: Associates a filter to the acquisition agent.

method.name: SetValuation
method.abstract: Values an agent dynamically.

class.name: CATAcquisitionFilter
class.abstract: The basic class for a filter.

class.name: CATBasicMultiDocumentCommand
class.abstract: Class to define a state dialog command to achieve a selection in any nonactive document.

class.name: CATCmdSwitchAgent
class.abstract: Class which defines an acquisition agent visualizable in a toolbar.

class.name: CATCommandHeaderWithSDOForAgent
class.abstract: Class for command headers to represent Dialog Agents in a toolbar.

constructor.name: CATCommandHeaderWithSDOForAgent
constructor.abstract: Constructs a header to represent Dialog Agent in a toolbar.

class.name: CATCustomizableState
class.abstract: Class base to create user state.

class.name: CATCustomizableTransition
class.abstract: Class representing a specialized transition.

class.name: CATDiaAction
class.abstract: Base class to create a command action.

method.name: AfterRedo
method.abstract: Redoes the action effects after the transactional redo.

method.name: AfterUndo
method.abstract: Undoes the action effects after the transactional undo.

method.name: BeforeRedo
method.abstract: Redoes the action effects before the transactional redo.

method.name: BeforeUndo
method.abstract: Undoes the action effects before the transactional undo.

method.name: Do
method.abstract: Executes the action.

method.name: SetAfterRedoMethod
method.abstract: Sets the method to redo the action after the transactional redo.

method.name: SetAfterUndoMethod
method.abstract: Sets the method to undo the action after the transactional undo.

method.name: SetBeforeRedoMethod
method.abstract: Sets the method to redo the action before the transactional redo.

method.name: SetBeforeUndoMethod
method.abstract: Sets the method to undo the action before the transactional undo.

method.name: SetData
method.abstract: Sets data which may be useful to execute or undo/redo the action.

method.name: SetExecuteMethod
method.abstract: Sets the method to execute the action.

class.name: CATDiaError
class.abstract: Class representing an error catched in a CATStateCommand command.

class.name: CATDialogAgent
class.abstract: Base class for a state command agent.

method.name: Accept
method.abstract: Values an agent dynamically.

method.name: AcceptOnNotify
method.abstract: Specifies the user interaction expected by the agent.

method.name: AcceptOnNotify
method.abstract: Specifies the user interaction expected by the agent.

method.name: AddPanelForNLS
method.abstract: Declares that the command shares its resource file with a dialog.

method.name: AfterRedo
method.abstract: After an agent's redo.

method.name: AfterUndo
method.abstract: After an agent's undo.

method.name: AndFilter
method.abstract: Creates a AND combination of two filters.

method.name: BeforeRedo
method.abstract: Before an agent's redo.

method.name: BeforeUndo
method.abstract: Before an agent's undo.

method.name: GetBehavior
method.abstract: Returns the agent behavior.

method.name: GetEditor
method.abstract: Returns the editor associated with the command.

method.name: IgnoreOnNotify
method.abstract: Cancels the effect of the AcceptOnNotify method.

method.name: IgnoreOnNotify
method.abstract: Cancels the effect of the AcceptOnNotify method.

method.name: InitializeAcquisition
method.abstract: Resets an agent to have it reusable.

method.name: IsOutputSet
method.abstract: Tests whether the agent is valued.

method.name: NotFilter
method.abstract: Creates a filter reverse of another one.

method.name: OrFilter
method.abstract: Creates a OR combination of two filters.

method.name: RequestDelayedDestruction
method.abstract: Requests the command delayed destruction.

method.name: SetBehavior
method.abstract: Sets the agent behavior.

method.name: TryValue
method.abstract: Tries to value an agent with a given value.

class.name: CATDialogState
class.abstract: Class to create a command state.

method.name: AddDialogAgent
method.abstract: Adds a dialog agent in the state.

method.name: GetDialogAgent
method.abstract: Returns an state agent using the agent index.

method.name: GetDialogAgentSize
method.abstract: Returns the count of agents in the state.

method.name: GetEnterAction
method.abstract: Returns the entry action.

method.name: GetLeaveAction
method.abstract: Returns the exit action.

method.name: GetLeaveCondition
method.abstract: Returns the exit condition.

method.name: GetResourceID
method.abstract: Returns the resource identifier.

method.name: RemoveDialogAgent
method.abstract: Removes a dialog agent in the state.

method.name: SetEnterAction
method.abstract: Sets the entry action.

method.name: SetLeaveAction
method.abstract: Sets the exit action.

method.name: SetLeaveCondition
method.abstract: Sets the exit condition.

method.name: SetResourceID
method.abstract: Sets the resource identifier.

class.name: CATDialogTransition
class.abstract: Class to create a command transition.

method.name: AddInitialState
method.abstract: Adds a source state to the transition.

method.name: GetAction
method.abstract: Returns the transition action.

method.name: GetCondition
method.abstract: Returns the transition condition.

method.name: GetFinalState
method.abstract: Returns the target state.

method.name: GetInitialState
method.abstract: Returns a source state using the source state index.

method.name: GetInitialStateNumber
method.abstract: Returns the count of source states.

method.name: GetResourceID
method.abstract: Retrieves the resource identifier.

method.name: RemoveInitialState
method.abstract: Removes a source state from the transition.

method.name: SetAction
method.abstract: Sets the transition action.

method.name: SetCondition
method.abstract: Sets the transition condition.

method.name: SetFinalState
method.abstract: Sets the target state.

method.name: SetResourceID
method.abstract: Sets the resource identifier.

class.name: CATEditAgent
class.abstract: Class representing an agent to edit an object in a workbench different from the current one.

method.name: GetValue
method.abstract: Returns the path of the edited object.

method.name: SetCommandSet
method.abstract: Sets the commands available during the edition.

method.name: SetElementProvider
method.abstract: Sets the method to provide the object to edit.

method.name: SetPanel
method.abstract: Sets the dialog object, if any, representing the command.

method.name: SetWorkbench
method.abstract: Sets the workbench used during the edition.

class.name: CATIndicationAgent
class.abstract: Class representing an agent dedicated to indication.

method.name: GetMathPlane
method.abstract: Returns the plane on which a point selected in a 3D viewer is projected.

method.name: GetModifier
method.abstract: Returns whether the shift and control keys have been pushed during the indication.

method.name: GetValue
method.abstract: Returns the agent value.

method.name: SetMathPlane
method.abstract: Sets the plane on which to project a point selected in a 3D viewer.

method.name: SetValue
method.abstract: Sets the agent value.

class.name: CATLISTP(CATDiaAction)
class.abstract: Collection class for pointers to <tt>CATDiaAction</tt>.

class.name: CATLISTP(CATDialogAgent)
class.abstract: Collection class for pointers to <tt>CATDialogAgent</tt>.

class.name: CATLISTP(CATDialogState)
class.abstract: Collection class for pointers to <tt>CATDialogState</tt>.

class.name: CATMultiDocumentCommand
class.abstract: Base class to define a state dialog command to achieve a selection in any nonactive document.

method.name: ReturnListOfValues
method.abstract: Returns to the agent the selected objects as a path element.

method.name: ReturnValue
method.abstract: Returns to the agent the selected object as a path element.

data.name: _fromCommand
data.abstract: The agent which has instantiated this command.

class.name: CATOtherDocumentAgent
class.abstract: Class to define a dialog agent that enables selection in a nonactive document.

class.name: CATPanelState
class.abstract: Class representing a state dedicated to manage a dialog box.

method.name: GetApplyTransition
method.abstract: Returns the transition linked to the Apply button.

method.name: GetCancelTransition
method.abstract: Returns the transition linked to the Cancel button.

method.name: GetCloseTransition
method.abstract: Returns the transition linked to the Close button.

method.name: GetHelpTransition
method.abstract: Returns the transition linked to the Help button.

method.name: GetOkTransition
method.abstract: Returns the transition linked to the Ok button.

method.name: GetPreviewTransition
method.abstract: Returns the transition linked to the Preview button.

class.name: CATPathElementAgent
class.abstract: Class representing an agent dedicated to selection.

method.name: AddElementType
method.abstract: Sets an object type expected by the agent.

method.name: GetElementType
method.abstract: Returns an object type from those expected by the agent by using the object type index.

method.name: GetElementTypeSize
method.abstract: Returns the count of object types expected by the agent.

method.name: GetElementValue
method.abstract: Returns the selected object.

method.name: GetListOfValues
method.abstract: Returns the agent list of values.

method.name: GetModifier
method.abstract: Returns whether the shift and control keys have been pushed during the selection.

method.name: GetOrderedTypeList
method.abstract: Returns the ordered list of object types expected by the agent.

method.name: GetValue
method.abstract: Returns the agent value.

method.name: RequestDelayedDestruction
method.abstract: Requests the CATPathElementAgent delayed destruction.

method.name: ResetNoSelectionCursor
method.abstract: Resets the customized "No Selection" cursor.

method.name: ResetPreselectionCursor
method.abstract: Resets the customized "Preselection" cursor.

method.name: SetListOfValues
method.abstract: Sets the agent list of values.

method.name: SetMessage
method.abstract: Adds a message to the tooltip displayed over the selected object.

method.name: SetNoSelectionCursor
method.abstract: Sets a customized "No Selection" cursor.

method.name: SetOrderedTypeList
method.abstract: Sets an ordered list of object types expected by the agent.

method.name: SetPreselectionCursor
method.abstract: Sets a customized "Preselection" cursor.

method.name: SetValue
method.abstract: Sets the agent value.

class.name: CATStateActivateNotification
class.abstract: Class representing a notification whose instance is received when a state command is activated.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of the activate notification.

method.name: ResumedAfterSharedKO
method.abstract: Returns whether the shared command reached the Cancel state.

class.name: CATStateCancelNotification
class.abstract: Class representing a notification whose instance is received when a state command is cancelled.

method.name: GetType
method.abstract: Returns the type of the activate notification.

class.name: CATStateCommand
class.abstract: Base class for a State Command.

method.name: Action
method.abstract: Creates an action given the addresses of the methods to execute.

method.name: AddCSOClient
method.abstract: Declares an agent as a CSO client.

method.name: AddDialogState
method.abstract: Adds an existing state to the command.

method.name: AddDialogState
method.abstract: Creates a state.

method.name: AddLocalUndo
method.abstract: Adds a local Undo step.

method.name: AddSDOElement
method.abstract: Sets the object in the CATSDO.

method.name: AddTransition
method.abstract: Creates a transition given its source and target states.

method.name: AddTransition
method.abstract: Creates a transition given its source and target states, its condition and its action.

method.name: AndAction
method.abstract: Creates a composite action which combines actions using the AND operator.

method.name: AndCondition
method.abstract: Creates a composite condition which combines conditions using the AND operator.

method.name: BuildGraph
method.abstract: Builds the command statechart.

method.name: Condition
method.abstract: Creates a condition given the address of a method to execute.

method.name: ExecuteUndoAtEnd
method.abstract: Requests to undo the State Command when it ends.

method.name: Filter
method.abstract: Creates an agent filter given the address of a method to execute.

method.name: GetCancelState
method.abstract: Creates the cancel state or retrieves it if it already exists.

method.name: GetCurrentState
method.abstract: Returns the current state.

method.name: GetError
method.abstract: Returns the error caught by DialogEngine during a condition evaluation or an action execution.

method.name: GetGlobalUndo
method.abstract: Returns the undo/redo object associated with the command.

method.name: GetInitialState
method.abstract: Creates the initial state or retrieves it if it already exists.

method.name: GetLastModifiedAgent
method.abstract: Returns the agent which has just been modified.

method.name: GetLastNotification
method.abstract: Returns the latest notification.

method.name: GetNextState
method.abstract: Returns the pointed command state and points to the next one.

method.name: GetNextTransition
method.abstract: Returns the pointed command transition and points to the next one.

method.name: InitStateList
method.abstract: Points to the first command state.

method.name: InitTransitionList
method.abstract: Points to the first command transition.

method.name: IsLastModifiedAgent
method.abstract: Tests if an agent has just been modified.

method.name: IsLastModifiedAgentCondition
method.abstract: Creates a condition which checks whether an agent is the latest modified agent.

method.name: IsLastModifiedAgentCondition
method.abstract: Creates a condition which checks whether an agent is the latest modified agent.

method.name: IsOutputSetCondition
method.abstract: Creates a condition which checks whether an agent is valued.

method.name: IsRedoMode
method.abstract: Tests if a redo is being processed.

method.name: NotCondition
method.abstract: Creates a composite condition which uses the NOT operator on its subcondition.

method.name: NotCondition
method.abstract: Creates a NOT condition given the address of a method to execute.

method.name: OrAction
method.abstract: Creates a composite action which combines actions using the OR operator.

method.name: OrCondition
method.abstract: Creates a composite condition which combines conditions using the OR operator.

method.name: RemoveState
method.abstract: Removes a state from a command.

method.name: RemoveTransition
method.abstract: Removes a transition from a command.

method.name: RequestDelayedDestruction
method.abstract: Requests the state command delayed destruction.

method.name: RequestLocalUndo
method.abstract: Requests to undo local steps in the State Command.

method.name: Rescue
method.abstract: Cleans data if an error occurs.

method.name: SetDebugMode
method.abstract: Sets the debug mode.

method.name: SetErrorCommand
method.abstract: Sets a specific command to manage errors.

method.name: SetInitialState
method.abstract: Declares a state as the initial state.

class.name: CATStateCondition
class.abstract: Base class to create a condition.

method.name: GetStatus
method.abstract: Evaluates the condition.

method.name: SetData
method.abstract: Sets data which may be useful to evaluate the condition.

method.name: SetMethod
method.abstract: Sets the method to evaluate the condition.

class.name: CATStateDesactivateNotification
class.abstract: Class representing a notification whose instance is received when a state command is deactivated.

define.name: CmdDeclareResource
define.abstract: Enables the use of a resource file whose name is the current class name.

define.name: CmdDeclareResourceFile
define.abstract: Enables the use of a resource file whose name is different from the current class name.

class.name: CATICmdSwitchAgent
class.abstract: Interface to define an acquisition agent visualizable in a toolbar.

method.name: AddSwitch
method.abstract: Adds a switch to a switch agent.

method.name: GetActiveSwitch
method.abstract: Returns the index of the active switch.

method.name: LockSwitch
method.abstract: Locks a switch.

method.name: SetActiveSwitch
method.abstract: Activates a switch without triggering a transition.

method.name: UnlockSwitch
method.abstract: Unlocks a switch.

method.name: UnsetActiveSwitch
method.abstract: Deactivates the active switch.

typedef.name: ElementProvider
typedef.abstract: Prototype of the element provider methods.

typedef.name: FilterMethod
typedef.abstract: Method called to test an acquisition before an agent is prevaluated or valuated.
